attributes.action: Stop privatization of 'Gibraltar Hospital Services , towards  staff services!!!
attributes.additional_details: We call for a ban on the outsourcing (privatisation) of Gibraltar Hospital Services (GHS), and stop the renewal of any staff hire outsourcing contracts already signed. Companies should not be profiteering from GHS contracts, when every pound of GHS budgets is desperately needed for more doctors and nurses, and pay for their training courses....
attributes.background: Stop privatization of 'Gibraltar Hospital Services , towards  staff services!!!
